thread.title: Texas university students to protest gun law with dildos
thread.title_full: Texas university students to protest gun law with dildos

title: Texas university students to protest gun law with dildos
text: doogz said: TheEnd said: That's one of the problems with students, they want to protest something, but aren't quite sure what to do, so just do something edgy to "send out a message", even if none of them can say what the message was supposed to be. ""The State of Texas has decided that it is not at all obnoxious to allow deadly concealed weapons in classrooms, however it DOES have strict rules about free sexual expression, to protect your innocence," wrote Ms Jin, a student at the University of Texas at Austin."You would receive a citation for taking a DILDO to class before you would get in trouble for taking a gun to class. Heaven forbid the penis," she added."Kinda sounds like she knows what she means to me? I don't think that's strange or unusual in any way, or that it highlights anything in particular.Parents aren't going to get embarrassing questions if their kids see a gun.She hasn't noticed the concealed bit either, and she's not going to get a citation for having a dildo in her bag where no one can see it.If someone was openly carrying a gun, they'd get in more trouble than opening carrying a dildo, so whatever sort of double standards she's trying to highlight don't really exist, but hey, they get to act all edgy...
